<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Communal Sustain](/Feats.aspx?ID=2245) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 48</row>

**Archetype** [Spellmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=32)

**Frequency**
once per round

**Prerequisites**
[Spellmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1134)

</column>

---

Choose one spell with a sustained duration that one of your allies has in effect. You must be within 30 feet of the chosen ally. The ally can Sustain the Spell once as a free action, triggered at the start of their next turn.
name: Communal Sustain
